ValidationRule.description: A leave should be applied 48 hours earlier, so if an employee is applying for leave on an nth day for Comp off, the employee can take leave from (n+2) the day.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL( EMS_LM_Leave_Type_Name__c , 'Compensatory off'),( EMS_LM_Leave_Start_Date__c - TODAY() )< 2) || AND(ISPICKVAL( EMS_LM_Leave_Type_Name__c , 'Paternity Leave'),( EMS_LM_Leave_Start_Date__c - TODAY() )< 2)
